SELECT column_name AS COL_CODE, column_comment AS COL_NAME, #{pd.RPT_DUR} as RPT_DUR,
#{pd.TABLE_CODE} AS TABLE_CODE,#{pd.TABLE_NAME} AS TABLE_NAME, '0' AS DISP_ORDER,'0' AS DICT_TRANS,'1' AS COL_HIDE,'0' AS COL_SUM,'0' AS COL_AVE FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema ='ywgl' AND table_name = #{pd.TABLE_CODE}

select t.RPT_DUR, '${pd.SelectedDepartCode}' DEPT_CODE, b.NAME DEPT_NAME,
t.TABLE_CODE, c.KPI_NAME TABLE_NAME, t.COL_CODE, t.COL_NAME,
t.DICT_TRANS DICT_TRANS_DETAIL, t.COL_HIDE, t.DISP_ORDER,
t.RPT_DUR RPT_DUR__, '${pd.SelectedDepartCode}' DEPT_CODE__,
t.TABLE_CODE TABLE_CODE__, t.COL_CODE COL_CODE__,
IFNULL(input.DICT_TRANS, '0') DICT_TRANS, IFNULL(input.COL_COND, '') COL_COND, IFNULL(input.COL_MAPPING, '') COL_MAPPING, IFNULL(input.COL_NULL, '0') COL_NULL, IFNULL(input.COL_STATE, '0') COL_STATE, IFNULL(tip.NULL_VALUE_PREFIX, '') NULL_VALUE_PREFIX, IFNULL(tip.NULL_VALUE_SUFFIX, '') NULL_VALUE_SUFFIX, IFNULL(tip.DIC_PREFIX, '') DIC_PREFIX, IFNULL(tip.DIC_SUFFIX, '') DIC_SUFFIX, IFNULL(tip.COND_PREFIX, '') COND_PREFIX, IFNULL(tip.COND_SUFFIX, '') COND_SUFFIX, IFNULL(tip.MAPPING_PREFIX, '') MAPPING_PREFIX, IFNULL(tip.MAPPING_SUFFIX, '') MAPPING_SUFFIX
from (select * from
and TABLE_CODE = #{pd.ShowStruTableCode}

left join (select * from where TABLE_CODE = #{pd.ShowStruTableCode} ) input on t.COL_CODE = input.COL_CODE

LEFT JOIN oa_department b on '${pd.SelectedDepartCode}' = b.DEPARTMENT_CODE LEFT JOIN tb_assess_kpi c on t.TABLE_CODE = c.TABLE_CODE
ORDER BY t.DISP_ORDER ASC
